Description
AgeAndMostProductProjection
A projection interface for retrieving data related to a product, along with its associated client age.

A projection interface for retrieving data related to the most frequently purchased product category by a client based on their age.

Custom filter to handle user authentication during login.
AppAuthorizationFilter
Custom filter to handle authorization by parsing the access token from the request.

Configuration class for application-level beans.

Implementation of the UserDetailsService interface for loading user details.

Data Transfer Object (DTO) used for authentication purposes.
AuthenticationErrorDto
Data Transfer Object (DTO) used to represent an authentication error.
BaseEntity
Base class for entities that require an ID field.

A projection interface for retrieving data related to the most significant clients within a specific product category.

A DTO that represents the statistics of a product category and its associated price statistics.

Represents a client in the system.

A generic interface for converting between two types: an entity and a model.

CrudRepository<T>
Base repository interface for all entities with a primary key of type Long.
CrudService<U>
A generic interface that provides CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) operations for entities of type CrudService.

A DTO representing an email address.
EmailDtoValidator
Implementation of the Validator interface for validating EmailDto objects.
EmailService
Interface for sending emails.
EmailServiceImpl
Implementation of the EmailService interface that provides functionality for sending emails.
GenericServiceImpl<T,U>
A generic implementation of the CrudService interface providing basic CRUD operations for entities of type GenericServiceImpl and model type GenericServiceImpl.
GlobalExceptionHandler
Global exception handler for managing exceptions thrown across the application.
GroupByDto<T,U>

InvalidCredentialsException
Custom exception class that represents an invalid credentials error.

Represents a product in the system.

Validator for validating ProductDto objects.
ProductEntity
Entity representing a product in the database.
ProductFilterSpecification
A record that represents the filter criteria for querying ProductEntity objects based on price range and category.
ProductRepository
Repository interface for managing ProductEntity entities in the persistence layer.
ProductsConverter
Interface for converting a list of Product entities to their corresponding ProductDto representations and for performing other conversion tasks related to products and statistics.
ProductsConverterImpl
Implementation of the ProductsConverter interface for converting Product entities to ProductDto data transfer objects (DTOs) and performing various transformations for product-related statistics.
ProductService
Interface for managing products.
ProductServiceImpl
Implementation of the ProductService interface that provides CRUD operations for managing products.
ProductsFilterDto
A DTO representing the filters that can be applied when retrieving products.
ProductSpecification
Interface defining the contract for filtering ProductEntity objects.
ProductSpecificationImpl
Implementation of the ProductSpecification interface that provides methods for filtering ProductEntity objects based on specific criteria like category and price.

Data Transfer Object (DTO) used to represent a refresh token.

A generic DTO representing a response with either data or an error message.

Interface for converting data related to shops and statistics into different representations.

Interface for generating shop statistics related to clients, products, and categories.

Interface representing a statistic for a collection of products with a specific type of value (e.g., price).
StatisticDto
A DTO representing statistical information about a collection of products.
StatisticImpl
Implementation of the Statistic interface for storing and processing statistical data regarding products, such as the minimum, maximum, and average prices for a given category.

Data Transfer Object (DTO) used to represent both the access token and the refresh token.
TokenService
Interface for handling JWT token generation, parsing, and refreshing operations.
TokenServiceImpl
Service implementation for handling JWT token creation, parsing, and refreshing.

Represents a user within the application.

Listener class responsible for handling user activation events.

Custom exception class that represents a scenario where a user is already activated.

Data Transfer Object (DTO) used to represent the details of a user.
UserEmailRefreshToken
A DTO representing the data required to refresh a user's email-related token.
UserEntity
JPA Entity representing a user in the database.

Repository interface for managing UserEntity entities in the persistence layer.
UserService

Implementation of the UserService interface.
